## Protocol.Fetch.RequestPattern.urlPattern property

Wildcards ('\*' -<!-- -->&gt; zero or more, '?' -<!-- -->&gt; exactly one) are allowed. Escape character is backslash. Omitting is equivalent to "\*".

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
urlPattern?: string;
```
